mapper.sql: a.bianhao AS "bianhao", a.name AS "name", a.jianma AS "jianma", a.guding AS "guding", a.xuhao AS "xuhao"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM useable_shoufeileimu a
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO useable_shoufeileimu( bianhao, name, jianma, guding, xuhao ) VALUES ( #{bianhao}, #{name}, #{jianma}, #{guding}, #{xuhao} )
mapper.update: UPDATE useable_shoufeileimu SET bianhao = #{bianhao}, name = #{name}, jianma = #{jianma}, guding = #{guding}, xuhao = #{xuhao} WHERE id = #{id}
